decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly generate mana and cast powerful spells, specifically through using rituals and mana rocks to ramp up quickly. This deck utilizes cards like Burning Wish and Wish to tutor up specific combo pieces, while also having access to powerful draw spells like Galvanic Relay and Echo of Eons to refill the hand. By utilizing fast mana sources like Lion's Eye Diamond and Lotus Petal, this deck aims to combo off and win the game in a single explosive turn, often using cards like Jeska's Will and Rite of Flame to generate large amounts of mana.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle using low-cost creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards like Mishra's Bauble, Fatal Push, and Thoughtseize to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy, the deck aims to quickly assemble a threatening board presence with cards like Barrowgoyf, Nethergoyf, and Orcish Bowmasters. The deck also includes Sheoldred's Edict and Hymn to Tourach for additional disruption, while leveraging lands like Wasteland to keep the opponent on the back foot.

This UWx Control deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. Utilizing cards like Force of Will, Swords to Plowshares, and Teferi, Time Raveler, the deck aims to control the board while drawing into more answers with cards like Brainstorm and Ponder. The inclusion of Murktide Regent provides a win condition that can quickly close out the game. Leyline Binding and Supreme Verdict offer additional removal options, while Meticulous Archive helps to dig deeper into the deck for more answers.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan through a combination of Stax pieces like Trinisphere and Chalice of the Void, as well as graveyard hate with Leyline of the Void. Karn, the Great Creator provides additional control and utility, while cards like Pithing Needle and The One Ring can shut down key opposing threats. The deck also has powerful finishers in Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Fell the Profane. The mana base is optimized for fast and consistent ramping using cards like Ancient Tomb and Chrome Mox.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful creatures. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also establishing a strong board presence with cards like Murktide Regent and Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. The inclusion of cards like Brainstorm and Ponder allow for card selection and manipulation to find key pieces of the deck. Additionally, the mana base includes a variety of fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent mana production for the deck's powerful spells.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the game by using efficient counterspells and removal spells while also putting pressure on the opponent with creatures like Delver of Secrets, Questing Druid, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while quickly closing out the game with a combination of damage from creatures and direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt. Additionally, the deck has land disruption capabilities with cards like Wasteland to further disrupt the opponent's mana base.
